text: 'Daydreams in Cold Weather' (2002) is an album by DJ John Tejada. ==Track listing== All tracks by John Tejada #"To The West" – 4:51 #"Stop The Mechanism" – 4:31 #"Create Fixate" – 4:42 #"Shifted" – 5:13 #"Young" – 5:54 #"Summer Rain" – 5:18 #"Count The Seconds" – 4:54 #"Rehearsing Disaster" – 4:59 #"Abre Los Ojos" – 4:03 #"The Silence of Us" – 5:24 - featuring Divine Styler #"In Coach" – 5:06 #"Some Would Know Why" – 5:02 == Personnel == *Divine Styler – Vocals *Shawn King – Design *Carmen Tejada – Vocals *John Tejada – Producer Category:2002 albums Category:John Tejada albums
title: Daydreams in Cold Weather
